title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems - this is in red text.
OB: The text in the Copy Project dialog is displayed in red.
EB: If I uncheck the default location checkbox, the default location should remain in the edit box; it should not clear. The text should be black, and it should include the standard on-the-fly validation small error icon.
SR:
1. Open the Copy Project dialog.
2. Observe the text color and style.
3. Uncheck the default location checkbox.
4. Check the text in the edit box for the default location.
